Description

Concrete class for working with cell elements.

Methods

__construct, getColumn, getDOM, getInputValue, getNumericValue, getRow, setColumn, setInputValue, setNumericValue, setRow, takeAttributeFromDOM,

__construct( string   $text = null, string   $row = null, string   $col = null, string   $inputValue = null, string   $numericValue = null, ) : n/a

Description

Constructs a new Zend_Gdata_Spreadsheets_Extension_Cell element.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$text string | (optional) Text contents of the element. null
$row string | (optional) Row attribute of the element. null
$col string | (optional) Column attribute of the element. null
$inputValue string | (optional) Input value attribute of the element. null
$numericValue string | (optional) Numeric value attribute of the element. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
